com.actionsoft.sdk.local.api.cc

接口 HBaseAPI


  • public interface HBaseAPI

    支持日志和审计的操作：全部

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void createTable(HTableDescriptor table, HColumnDescriptor... family)
      创建hbase表
      void delete(java.lang.String tableName, java.lang.Object row, java.lang.String familyName)
      Deletes a single qualifier in the given table and family.
      void delete(java.lang.String tableName, java.lang.Object row, java.lang.String familyName, java.lang.String qualifier)
      Deletes a single cell in the given table.
      void execute(ConnectionCallback action)
      hbase Connection回调方法
      <T> T execute(java.lang.String tableName, <any> action)
      Executes the given action against the specified table handling resource management.
      <T> T find(java.lang.String tableName, Scan scan, <any> action)
      Scans the target table using the given Scan object.
      <T> java.util.List<T> find(java.lang.String tableName, Scan scan, <any> action)
      Scans the target table using the given Scan object.
      <T> T find(java.lang.String tableName, java.lang.String family, <any> action)
      Scans the target table, using the given family.
      <T> java.util.List<T> find(java.lang.String tableName, java.lang.String family, <any> action)
      Scans the target table, using the given column family.
      <T> T find(java.lang.String tableName, java.lang.String family, java.lang.String qualifier, <any> action)
      Scans the target table, using the given column family and qualifier.
      <T> java.util.List<T> find(java.lang.String tableName, java.lang.String family, java.lang.String qualifier, <any> action)
      Scans the target table, using the given column family.

      Gets an individual row from the given table.

      Gets an individual row from the given table.

      Gets an individual row from the given table.
      void put(java.lang.String table, Put put)
      Puts a single value in to the given table.

    • 方法详细资料

      • createTable

        void createTable(HTableDescriptor table,
                 HColumnDescriptor... family)
        创建hbase表

      • execute

        void execute(ConnectionCallback action)
        hbase Connection回调方法

      • execute

        <T> T execute(java.lang.String tableName,
              <any> action)
        Executes the given action against the specified table handling resource management.

        Application exceptions thrown by the action object get propagated to the caller (can only be unchecked). Allows for returning a result object (typically a domain object or collection of domain objects).

        类型参数:
        T - action type
        参数:
        tableName - the target table
        action - callback object that specifies the action
        返回:
        the result object of the callback action, or null

      • find

        <T> T find(java.lang.String tableName,
           java.lang.String family,
           <any> action)
        Scans the target table, using the given family. The content is processed by the given action typically returning a domain object or collection of domain objects.
        类型参数:
        T - action type
        参数:
        tableName - target table
        family - column family
        action - action handling the scanner results
        返回:
        the result object of the callback action, or null

      • find

        <T> T find(java.lang.String tableName,
           java.lang.String family,
           java.lang.String qualifier,
           <any> action)
        Scans the target table, using the given column family and qualifier. The content is processed by the given action typically returning a domain object or collection of domain objects.
        类型参数:
        T - action type
        参数:
        tableName - target table
        family - column family
        qualifier - column qualifier
        action - action handling the scanner results
        返回:
        the result object of the callback action, or null

      • find

        <T> T find(java.lang.String tableName,
           Scan scan,
           <any> action)
        Scans the target table using the given Scan object. Suitable for maximum control over the scanning process. The content is processed by the given action typically returning a domain object or collection of domain objects.
        类型参数:
        T - action type
        参数:
        tableName - target table
        scan - table scanner
        action - action handling the scanner results
        返回:
        the result object of the callback action, or null

      • find

        <T> java.util.List<T> find(java.lang.String tableName,
                           java.lang.String family,
                           <any> action)
        Scans the target table, using the given column family. The content is processed row by row by the given action, returning a list of domain objects.
        类型参数:
        T - action type
        参数:
        tableName - target table
        family - column family
        action - row mapper handling the scanner results
        返回:
        a list of objects mapping the scanned rows

      • find

        <T> java.util.List<T> find(java.lang.String tableName,
                           java.lang.String family,
                           java.lang.String qualifier,
                           <any> action)
        Scans the target table, using the given column family. The content is processed row by row by the given action, returning a list of domain objects.
        类型参数:
        T - action type
        参数:
        tableName - target table
        family - column family
        qualifier - column qualifier
        action - row mapper handling the scanner results
        返回:
        a list of objects mapping the scanned rows

      • find

        <T> java.util.List<T> find(java.lang.String tableName,
                           Scan scan,
                           <any> action)
        Scans the target table using the given Scan object. Suitable for maximum control over the scanning process. The content is processed row by row by the given action, returning a list of domain objects.
        类型参数:
        T - action type
        参数:
        tableName - target table
        scan - table scanner
        action - row mapper handling the scanner results
        返回:
        a list of objects mapping the scanned rows

      • get

        <T> T get(java.lang.String tableName,
          java.lang.Object row,
          <any> mapper)
        Gets an individual row from the given table. The content is mapped by the given action.
        类型参数:
        T - mapper type
        参数:
        tableName - target table
        row - row key
        mapper - row mapper
        返回:
        object mapping the target row

      • get

        <T> T get(java.lang.String tableName,
          java.lang.Object row,
          java.lang.String familyName,
          <any> mapper)
        Gets an individual row from the given table. The content is mapped by the given action.
        类型参数:
        T - mapper type
        参数:
        tableName - target table
        row - row key
        familyName - column family
        mapper - row mapper
        返回:
        object mapping the target row

      • get

        <T> T get(java.lang.String tableName,
          java.lang.Object row,
          java.lang.String familyName,
          java.lang.String qualifier,
          <any> mapper)
        Gets an individual row from the given table. The content is mapped by the given action.
        类型参数:
        T - mapper type
        参数:
        tableName - target table
        row - row key
        familyName - family
        qualifier - column qualifier
        mapper - row mapper
        返回:
        object mapping the target row

      • put

        void put(java.lang.String table,
         Put put)
        Puts a single value in to the given table.
        参数:
        tableName - target table
        rowName - row name
        familyName - family
        qualifier - column qualifier
        data - the byte array of the data value to be put

      • delete

        void delete(java.lang.String tableName,
            java.lang.Object row,
            java.lang.String familyName)
        Deletes a single qualifier in the given table and family.
        参数:
        tableName - target table
        row - row key
        familyName - family

      • delete

        void delete(java.lang.String tableName,
            java.lang.Object row,
            java.lang.String familyName,
            java.lang.String qualifier)
        Deletes a single cell in the given table.
        参数:
        tableName - target table
        row - row key
        familyName - family
        qualifier - column qualifier
